title: Some nice hand lettering on 1912 greeting card
content:

author: fontplayer

comments.content:
I haven’t seen that style of e in any font? (But I know that my font recognition skills are only 10% of some of the others here).

Has anyone seen an e with that shape ... I find it interesting.
